Heroic Effort.name: Heroic Effort
Heroic Effort.sourceRef: Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
Heroic Effort.flavor: Your grim focus and unbridled energy means that failure is not an option.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You miss with an attack or fail a saving throw.

Effect: You gain a +4 racial bonus to the attack roll or the saving throw.
Heroic Effort.trigger: You miss with an attack or fail a saving throw.
Heroic Effort.effect: You gain a +4 racial bonus to the attack roll or the saving throw.

Extra Effort.name: Extra Effort
Extra Effort.flavor: You dig deep to find the strength to overcome an affliction. Doing so leaves you momentarily drained.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You make a saving throw and dislike the result.

Effect: Reroll the saving throw with a +2 power bonus. The next saving throw you make before the end of the encounter takes a -2 penalty.
Extra Effort.trigger: You make a saving throw and dislike the result.
Extra Effort.effect: Reroll the saving throw with a +2 power bonus. The next saving throw you make before the end of the encounter takes a -2 penalty.

Rapid Move.name: Rapid Move
Rapid Move.flavor: You move with surprising swiftness, accomplishing more than most would think possible.

Flush with Success.name: Flush with Success
Flush with Success.flavor: You feel your confidence build with each attack that hits home.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You hit with an attack on your turn.

Effect: After the attack is resolved, you gain 5 temporary hit points and can then shift up to half your speed.
Flush with Success.trigger: You hit with an attack on your turn.
Flush with Success.effect:
After the attack is resolved, you gain 5 temporary hit points and can then shift up to half your speed.
    Level 16: 10 temporary hit points.
    Level 22: 15 temporary hit points.

Courageous Determination.name: Courageous Determination
Courageous Determination.flavor: Your enemyâ€™s success pales before your stalwart resolve. You refuse to give up.
Courageous Determination.trigger: An enemy bloodies you with an attack or hits you while you are bloodied.
Courageous Determination.effect: You can spend a healing surge and shift up to your speed. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses.
